alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 6:57AM CDT until April 23 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR DICKINSON AND SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 655 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Superior, or near Spirit Lake, moving north at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 653 AM CDT, public reported quarter sized hail located 5 miles east of Milford. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Superior around 700 AM CDT. Jackson In Jackson County and Kilen Woods State Park around 715 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Alpha. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
